EmailTemplate.subject: Pivotal Academy is upgrading
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Pivotal Academy is upgrading our Learning Management System (LMS). The new and improved portal will make it easier for you and your staff to search Pivotal Academy for new classes, schedules, and enroll in the latest technical training.
In preparation for the new LMS, access to the current system will be unavailable starting this Wednesday, October 7th at 6pm (PDT). Service will be suspended for approximately 48 hours. All users will receive an email notification from the LMS once our system is accessible.
Please review the following detailed information about your service.
- Classes In-Progress
- If you are presently enrolled in an online training class and wish to complete the class, please finish all remaining modules immediately.
- Classes that are in-progress will revert back to the original starting point within our new LMS. Partially completed course data will not transfer over.
- Certificates of Completion
- If you have completed a class and wish to print a Course Completion Certificate, select "Certificates" from your Dashboard and choose the corresponding course. Your certificate will automatically download. - Course Completion Certificates for previously completed courses will NOT be available in the new LMS.
- Enrolling in a Class
- You will not have access to any online classes hosted in the current LMS as of this Wednesday, October 7th. - Pivotal Academy recommends you do not start a new class unless you plan on completing all modules by this Wednesday.
- Pivotal will continually add new and updated classes to the LMS - providing you and your staff with a growing library of online training modules. Select online classes from our current system may be retired and no longer available.
- Accessing the new LMS
- Pivotal Academy anticipates the new LMS will be available by Friday, October 8th; All users will receive an email notification from the new LMS once the system is accessible. - Your first / last name and email address will transfer to the new system. - To access your account, please use the email address provided when you created your existing account.
- You will need to create a new password upon logging in. Previous passwords will not transfer.
Pivotal Academy is excited to bring you our next generation LMS. We are building a wealth of features and functionalities over the coming months in order to provide you and your team with a truly unique and enriching learning experience.
Thank you in advance and please contact us at education@pivotal.io <mailto:education@pivotal.io> if you have any questions.
